department.dept_long_name: Committee on Higher Degrees in Biostatistics

course.title: Probability Theory and Applications I
course.meeting_text: M., W., 1:30–3:20, and a weekly 90-minute lab.
course.description: Axiomatic foundations of probability, independence, conditional probability, joint distributions, transformations, moment generating functions, characteristic functions, moment inequalities, sampling distributions, modes of convergence and their interrelationships, laws of large numbers, central limit theorem, and stochastic processes.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the School of Public Health as BIO230.
